title: McFeast: breasts
creator_credit: Australian Broadcasting Commission, Mark Fitzgerald and Damian Davis
brief_description: Elle McFeast, (Lisbeth Gorr) with cohorts, Mark Warren, Mikey Robins and John Hinde explore the issue of breasts. A joyous celebration of women and their bodies. A host of stars including Kate Ceberano and Kate Fischer, as well as comments from people on the street, discuss the issue of cleavage in an unexploitative way.
